name: Gamified Learning Platform
description: Developed as a member of Google Developer Student Clubs McMaster’s open-source team, this web app aims to tackle students’ distracted learning and low engagement rates by adding interactive game-like elements to online education modules (such as leaderboards and point-redemption systems).
